channel.title: Why is nobody reporting bugs?
channel.description:
All i see is bug reports from the same 3 people me, rov, and misterhat........ and a few others involved in development
And 10x as many people complaining because the server hasnt been released yet

item.title: Why is nobody reporting bugs?
item.dc:creator: @cyndibal cyndibal
item.description:
@cyndibal wrote:

[quote=“Joe777, post:32, topic:428662”][quote author=cyndibal link=topic=531357.msg3883450#msg3883450 date=1326241008]
I’ve posted more bugs than anyone else so far. Sorry for posting them in the proper place
[/quote]

This is not a bug so why did you post it? Does it “bug” you that much?

At this point I am not sure how many more bugs could exist. Is there anything anyone has NOT tested yet so far?[/quote]
-_________________-

Read full topic

item.title: Why is nobody reporting bugs?
item.dc:creator: @cyndibal cyndibal
item.description:
@cyndibal wrote:

[quote=“Joe777, post:28, topic:428662”][quote author=pljay03 link=topic=531357.msg3883250#msg3883250 date=1326226406]
When you log out, the sound effects automatically turn back on, even if you had them turned off.
And you can’t drop or bank p2p items which is annoying.
[/quote]

The p2p items thing is pretty well known by now. As for the sfx I’d say that relates to the friend/ignore list too. My guess is no settings except for combat style and window size save when you logoff.

@cyndibal Why are you still posting here? Post bugs or GTFO.[/quote]
I’ve posted more bugs than anyone else so far. Sorry for posting them in the proper place

Read full topic

item.title: Why is nobody reporting bugs?
item.dc:creator: @cyndibal cyndibal
item.description:
@cyndibal wrote:

[quote=“Joe777, post:25, topic:428662”][quote author=cyndibal link=topic=531357.msg3883100#msg3883100 date=1326216265]

report bugs in this thread, i dont wanna force everyone to have to make a github account to report bugs, otherwise nobody will.
[/quote]No, they need to post on GitHub, or we’ll have a million duplicates, and need to port bugs from here you GitHub.

Or they could look at GitHub and/or previous posts here before posting.

Are you aware that the fact that you are posting here shows that you are too lazy and disrespectful to create an account on GitHub to post bugs?

Stop being a lazy selfish cunt and make a god damn GitHub account

Are you aware you are nothing but a troll? If you don’t have anything nice to say don’t say anything at all. For what you have just said to me i will never make a GitHub account now so take that [/quote]
dont really care, youre probably an idiot anyway if you cant take the time to make a github. did you know windows key opens the start menu?

Read full topic

item.title: Why is nobody reporting bugs?
item.dc:creator: @Joe777 Joe777
item.description:
@Joe777 wrote:

Commando:

3. Sometimes when mining it shows the action of mining above your head and there is ore there, but it doesnt say either: “you only succeed in scratching the rock” or “you receive some tin ore”, it just doesn’t say anything at all and fades away.

I can explain this one’s trigger: It happens if you click the rock again. Ranging has the same problem but worse. Ranging seems to fire shots based on the skill’s level at most but can also fire less shots. In other words Ranging is so bugged you have to click the same target repeatedly to fire again rather than start firing and it keep doing so! You also stop shooting a target who moves once shot.

Read full topic

item.title: Why is nobody reporting bugs?
item.dc:creator: @Commando Commando
item.description:
@Commando wrote:

  1. When you add somebody to friendslist it erases all of them when you re login. It probably has something to do with the database or the server but i’m just trying to help out.
  2. When you light a fire and then drop logs, when you move 1 square away you can auto-pick up the logs that you dropped on the fire without having to move.
  3. Sometimes when mining it shows the action of mining above your head and there is ore there, but it doesnt say either: “you only succeed in scratching the rock” or “you receive some tin ore”, it just doesn’t say anything at all and fades away.

Read full topic

alrite

item.title: Why is nobody reporting bugs?
item.dc:creator: @The_Djinn The Djinn
item.description:
@The_Djinn wrote:

ip0wns:

CLIENT IS HERE: : http://0.0.0.0/

You do know you were not suppose to release the client link? You were suppose to be in the IRC to get it. Which is why it’s not posted on this.

@OP:

People are posting bugs, they may not be posting the bugs on the forums. But so far there has been over 70+ bugs\issues reported.
32 Open Issues,
48 Closed issues

GitHub

MoparClassic/MoparClassic

MoparClassic - An emulator for an old java MMORPG
